tswitem.name: Signet of Defiance
tswitem.tooltip:
Signet of Defiance
Signet (QL 10)
Tradeable
Effect: Whenever you receive damage greater than 10% of your maximum health in a single hit, you gain a barrier which absorbs 100% of incoming damage. The barrier's strength is equal to 5%/10%/15% of your maximum health. This effect cannot occur more than once every 20 seconds. This Signet can be attached to Minor Talismans. Combine 10 of these in the Assembly window to receive one Signet of increased power.
